about_the_game:
Cat Got Your Tongue is an old-school horror point-and-click game. And let me tell you, you'll feel what it's like to be in the wrong place at the wrong time.

Turn your screen brightness to the fullest...


My previous game was "too bright," so I decided to make this one the darkest and the gloomiest.

No complicated puzzles.


There are no intricate puzzles in this game, but there's intricate gameplay where you, as the player, will have to figure things out. The game is built on exploring rooms and memorizing them. Look for items and use them to avoid a deadly fate.

Because, you're not alone in the house...


There's something bigger and thicker living here, something more evil, and hungry... lurking in the shadows. The House Cat. Playing tag with it, you should run immediately if you don't want to end up in someone's trash.

Because, you're not alone in the house...


There's something bigger and thicker living here, something more evil, and hungry... lurking in the shadows. The House Cat. Playing tag with it, you should run immediately if you don't want to end up in someone's trash.

name: Cat Got Your Tongue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64x
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 4205U, 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 610
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64x
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 4205U, 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 610
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Cat Got Your Tongue is a horror point-and-click game where you have to escape from the Home Cat by exploring the darkest corners of the house.
